text:
Skypicker - https://www.skypicker.com | Brno, Czech Republic | ONSITE, INTERNS

Skypicker is a flight ticket search engine offering the cheapest possible flight combinations by combining low cost and legacy carriers. And thus doing real big data. With more than 400 employees and daily revenues over $600k we are still growing. If you actually read this description, please address our CTO as 'Jozo' in your email.

Our DevOps are managing more than 200 bare metal servers and one of the largest AWS infrastructures around here. Technology: Python, PostgreSQL, Redis, nginx, Ansible, node.js, React

Positions: Data science, Backend dev, Frontend dev, Mobile app dev, DevOps

We offer competitive salaries and a pure startup environment. Also, partial remote work is possible. Feel free to ping our CTO directly at jk/at/skypicker.com
